about_the_game:
Vector Strike: A dynamic, physics-driven digital sport where skill and collaboration reign supreme. Unleash spectacular moves like double jumps, wall runs, and dashes to outmaneuver opponents. Select your unique striker from a diverse roster and conquer the arena in thrilling matches. Join Early Access and contribute to the evolution of this exciting new competitive sport.

PHYSICS-BASED INNOVATIVE GAMEPLAY

Immerse yourself in a competitive game that combines precision shooting, an infinite skill cap, and intuitive controls for a challenging yet accessible experience. Master physics-based gameplay and sophisticated ball physics that deliver dynamic, deterministic action. Use unique character abilities to blend strategy and skill, rewarding timing, accuracy, and adaptability at every turn.

MASTER DIFFERENT STRIKERS

Strikers are armed with unique utilities and movement abilities that can create meaningful opportunities. Every striker offers a distinct playstyle, there's a perfect match for every player—whether you thrive on precision, strategy, or chaos. The arena is yours to command, with endless possibilities to dominate and outsmart your opponents.

STRATEGIZE TO WIN

You decide how to win. The gameplay objectives revolve around scoring goals through strategic positioning and skillful use of each character’s unique abilities. The dynamic blend of intense action and team-focused strategy encourages players to coordinate and adapt. As the game evolves, players are challenged to read the flow of play, learn from each match, and discover innovative ways to outsmart opponents and secure victory. Vector Strike is a non-lethal game where every projectile matters, instead of focusing on lethal action, you'll need to strategize and cooperate with your teammates to score goals.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS

Vector Strike is a 4v4 competitive game where you can queue up alone or with one, two, or three friends in both public and private matches. Challenge the entire world or just your friends in public or private matches. Showcase your skills to your friends and create amazing memories of clips of your best plays and go viral!

name: Vector Strike

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel I5 8400/ AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel I5 10500 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 8GB / Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required

short_description: Vector Strike is a fast-paced, physics based, non violent digital sport where mastery and teamwork are key to win. Shoot, double-jump, wall run, slide, dash, pass and score goals in intense 4v4 multiplayer matches where every decision counts.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Polish
*languages with full audio support
